data.title: BCC Announces Enforcement Action on Unlicensed Cannabis Retailer
data.excerpt: The Bureau of Cannabis Control and the Department of Consumer Affairs’ Cannabis Enforcement Unit today announced enforcement action on an unlicensed cannabis retailer operating out of Los Angeles.
data.author: Department of Cannabis Control
